verses.text: Canst thou draw \w out|strong="H2904"\w* leviathan \w with|strong="H1571"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* fishhook? \w Or|strong="H1571"\w* press \w down|strong="H2904"\w* \w his|strong="H1571"\w* tongue \w with|strong="H1571"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* cord?

Canst \w thou|strong="H6440"\w* put \w a|strong="H3068"\w* rope into \w his|strong="H6440"\w* nose? \w Or|strong="H3808"\w* pierce \w his|strong="H6440"\w* jaw \w through|strong="H3588"\w* \w with|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* hook?

\w Will|strong="H4310"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w make|strong="H7999"\w* many supplications \w unto|strong="H6923"\w* \w thee|strong="H7999"\w*? \w Or|strong="H4310"\w* \w will|strong="H4310"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* speak soft words \w unto|strong="H6923"\w* \w thee|strong="H7999"\w*?

\w Will|strong="H1697"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w make|strong="H2790"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* covenant \w with|strong="H1697"\w* thee, \w That|strong="H1697"\w* thou shouldest take \w him|strong="H1697"\w* \w for|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* servant forever?

Wilt \w thou|strong="H6440"\w* play \w with|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w as|strong="H6440"\w* \w with|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* bird? \w Or|strong="H4310"\w* wilt \w thou|strong="H6440"\w* bind \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w thy|strong="H6440"\w* maidens?

\w Will|strong="H4310"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* bands \add of fishermen\add* \w make|strong="H6605"\w* traffic \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*? \w Will|strong="H4310"\w* \w they|strong="H6440"\w* part \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w among|strong="H4310"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* merchants?
Canst thou fill \w his|strong="H5462"\w* skin with barbed irons, \w Or|strong="H4043"\w* \w his|strong="H5462"\w* head with fish-spears?
Lay thy hand \w upon|strong="H7307"\w* him; Remember \w the|strong="H5066"\w* battle, \w and|strong="H5066"\w* do \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="H3808"\w*, \w the|strong="H3920"\w* hope \w of|strong="H3808"\w* \w him|strong="H1692"\w* \w is|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* vain: \w Will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* cast down \w even|strong="H3808"\w* \w at|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3920"\w* sight \w of|strong="H3808"\w* \w him|strong="H1692"\w*?

None \w is|strong="H5869"\w* so fierce \w that|strong="H5869"\w* he dare stir \w him|strong="H5869"\w* up; Who then \w is|strong="H5869"\w* he \w that|strong="H5869"\w* \w can|strong="H5869"\w* \w stand|strong="H5869"\w* \w before|strong="H5869"\w* \w me|strong="H5869"\w*?

\w Who|strong="H1980"\w* \w hath|strong="H6310"\w* first given \w unto|strong="H4422"\w* \w me|strong="H1980"\w*, \w that|strong="H6310"\w* \w I|strong="H1980"\w* \w should|strong="H1980"\w* repay \w him|strong="H1980"\w*? \add Whatsoever is\add* under \w the|strong="H1980"\w* whole heaven \w is|strong="H6310"\w* mine.

\w I|strong="H3318"\w* \w will|strong="H6227"\w* \w not|strong="H3318"\w* keep silence concerning \w his|strong="H3318"\w* limbs, Nor \w his|strong="H3318"\w* mighty strength, nor \w his|strong="H3318"\w* goodly frame.

\w Who|strong="H5315"\w* can strip \w off|strong="H3318"\w* \w his|strong="H3318"\w* outer garment? \w Who|strong="H5315"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w come|strong="H3318"\w* within \w his|strong="H3318"\w* \w jaws|strong="H6310"\w*?

Who can \w open|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* doors \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w*? \w Round|strong="H3885"\w* about \w his|strong="H6440"\w* teeth \w is|strong="H6440"\w* terror.

\add His\add* \w strong|strong="H4651"\w* scales \w are|strong="H1077"\w* \add his\add* pride, Shut \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w together|strong="H1692"\w* \add as with\add* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w close|strong="H1692"\w* seal.
One \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w so|strong="H3644"\w* near \w to|strong="H3820"\w* another, \w That|strong="H3820"\w* \w no|strong="H3332"\w* air can come between them.
\w They|strong="H7667"\w* are joined one \w to|strong="H1481"\w* another; \w They|strong="H7667"\w* stick \w together|strong="H1481"\w*, so that \w they|strong="H7667"\w* cannot be sundered.

\w His|strong="H6965"\w* sneezings flash forth light, \w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w his|strong="H6965"\w* eyes \w are|strong="H2719"\w* like \w the|strong="H6965"\w* eyelids \w of|strong="H2719"\w* \w the|strong="H6965"\w* morning.
\w Out|strong="H2803"\w* \w of|strong="H6086"\w* \w his|strong="H2803"\w* mouth go burning torches, \w And|strong="H6086"\w* sparks \w of|strong="H6086"\w* fire leap forth.

\w Out|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3808"\w* nostrils \w a|strong="H3068"\w* smoke goeth, \w As|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* boiling pot \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \add burning\add* rushes.
\w His|strong="H2803"\w* breath kindleth coals, \w And|strong="H7494"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* flame goeth forth from \w his|strong="H2803"\w* mouth.
\w In|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* neck abideth strength, \w And|strong="H8478"\w* terror danceth \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w The|strong="H7760"\w* flakes \w of|strong="H3220"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* flesh are joined \w together|strong="H3220"\w*: \w They|strong="H7760"\w* are firm \w upon|strong="H7760"\w* \w him|strong="H7760"\w*; \w they|strong="H7760"\w* cannot \w be|strong="H3220"\w* moved.

\w His|strong="H2803"\w* heart \w is|strong="H8415"\w* \w as|strong="H2803"\w* firm \w as|strong="H2803"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* stone; Yea, firm \w as|strong="H2803"\w* \w the|strong="H2803"\w* nether millstone.

\w When|strong="H6213"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* raiseth \w himself|strong="H6213"\w* \w up|strong="H5921"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* mighty \w are|strong="H6213"\w* afraid: \w By|strong="H5921"\w* \w reason|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* consternation \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w are|strong="H6213"\w* \w beside|strong="H5921"\w* \w themselves|strong="H6213"\w*.

\w If|strong="H7200"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w lay|strong="H1121"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* sword, \w it|strong="H1931"\w* cannot avail; \w Nor|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* spear, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* dart, \w nor|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* pointed shaft.
He counteth iron as straw, \add And\add* brass as rotten wood.
The arrow cannot make him flee: Slingstones are turned with him into stubble.
Clubs are counted as stubble: He laugheth at the rushing of the javelin.
His underparts are \add like\add* sharp potsherds: He spreadeth \add as it were\add* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* threshing wain upon the mire.
He maketh the deep to boil like \w a|strong="H3068"\w* pot: He maketh the sea like \w a|strong="H3068"\w* pot of ointment.
He maketh \w a|strong="H3068"\w* path to shine after him; One would think the deep to be hoary.
Upon earth there is not his like, That is made without fear.
He beholdeth everything that is high: He is king over all the sons of pride.
